select.if: select username, gender, cellphone from jqgrid_test order by username asc limit #{startNum}, #{rows}

choose.when: select username, gender, cellphone from jqgrid_test order by ${sidx} asc, username asc limit #{startNum}, #{rows}
choose.otherwise: select username, gender, cellphone from jqgrid_test order by ${sidx} desc, username asc limit #{startNum}, #{rows}
